sense.def: Alternative Names ji jie 積結 accumulation and nodes.

Pathological Condition identical with ji 積 , accumulation. Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 Substance Entry shui zhi 水蛭：楚王食寒 菹，所得而吞之，果能去結積，雖曰陰佑，亦是物性兼然 “When the king of Chu consumed cold pickled vegetables, they were infested with [leeches] with the result that he swallowed them. They were indeed able to rid him of nodular accumulation . Although someone said that this was a case of numinous protection, it was also brought forth by the nature of that item [leeches]”.
